name: Bobby's World
overview: Bobby's World is an unreleased Super Game Boy-enhanced platformer based on the Howie Mandel cartoon of the same name. The game was first announced as Home Alone 2: Kevin's Dream in 1994. Nintendo Power Volume 67 (December 1994) briefly mentioned the change, noting "Now with a change of license and a Super Game Boy dash of color, it looks better and plays the same. Too bad." Both versions of the game were among the September 2020 lotcheck leaks.
